about_the_game:
Learn guitar and piano with an expanding library of thousands of songs!

Rocksmith+, an award-winning music learning service, is the evolution from Rocksmith 2014 Edition, which had to be retired for music licensing requirements.

In Rocksmith+, the catalog of licensed songs is different and expanded. As for the key features that made prior iterations help millions of players learn how to play guitar, they are the same. But Rocksmith+ now also includes piano – for the same price.

Our key features include Riff Repeater and Adaptative Difficulty to hone your skills. Rocksmith is the only music learning service that adjusts difficulty as you play. So, join the 5+ million of players to learn at YOUR pace with real-time feedback and song exercises. Rock on!

Note: If you purchased Rocksmith 2014 Edition, you can continue to use it.
detailed_description:
Learn guitar and piano with an expanding library of thousands of songs!

Rocksmith+, an award-winning music learning service, is the evolution from Rocksmith 2014 Edition, which had to be retired for music licensing requirements.

In Rocksmith+, the catalog of licensed songs is different and expanded. As for the key features that made prior iterations help millions of players learn how to play guitar, they are the same. But Rocksmith+ now also includes piano – for the same price.

Our key features include Riff Repeater and Adaptative Difficulty to hone your skills. Rocksmith is the only music learning service that adjusts difficulty as you play. So, join the 5+ million of players to learn at YOUR pace with real-time feedback and song exercises. Rock on!

Note: If you purchased Rocksmith 2014 Edition, you can continue to use it.
drm_notice: Ubisoft’s Online Services Platform. Ubisoft requires a permanent Internet connection to play this video game at all times.
ext_user_account_notice: Ubisoft Account (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
legal_notice: © 2024 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. The Rocksmith logo, Ubisoft, and the Ubisoft logo are registered or unregistered trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries.
name: Rocksmith+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K, AMD equivalent, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600, AMD integrated graphics equivalent, NVIDIA integrated graphics equivalent, or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: AMD FX 6350 / Intel Core i7-2500K, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 460 (2 GB) / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti (2 GB), or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: NA

oflc.descriptors: Mild themes, sexual references, drug references and coarse language.

short_description: Learn guitar and piano with an expanding library of thousands of songs!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
